rootCanalTreatment.title: Root Canal Treatment
rootCanalTreatment.shortDescription: Save your natural tooth with painless RCT procedure

meta.title: Root Canal Treatment (RCT) in Hapur | Ujjwal Dental Clinic
meta.description: Expert root canal treatment with modern techniques. Painless RCT procedure to save your natural tooth. Book appointment today!

hero.heading: Root Canal Treatment
hero.subheading: Painless procedure to save your natural tooth

overview.title: What is Root Canal Treatment?
overview.content:
Root canal treatment (RCT) is a dental procedure used to treat infection at the center of a tooth. The treatment involves removing the damaged or infected pulp, cleaning and disinfecting the inside of the tooth, then filling and sealing it.

At Ujjwal Dental Clinic, we use the latest technology and techniques to ensure your root canal procedure is as comfortable and painless as possible.

sections.title: Why Do You Need RCT?
items: Severe tooth decay reaching the pulp
Cracked or chipped tooth exposing the pulp
Repeated dental procedures on the same tooth
Injury to the tooth (even without visible damage)
Deep cavity that has infected the nerve

sections.title: Symptoms Indicating You Need RCT
items: Severe toothache when chewing or applying pressure
Prolonged sensitivity to hot or cold temperatures
Darkening or discoloration of the tooth
Swelling and tenderness in nearby gums
Persistent pimple on the gums
Pain that wakes you up at night

sections.title: Benefits of Root Canal Treatment
items: Saves your natural tooth
Eliminates pain and infection
Prevents spread of infection to other teeth
Restores normal chewing function
Maintains natural appearance
Cost-effective compared to extraction and implant

procedureSteps.title: X-Ray & Diagnosis
procedureSteps.description: We take a detailed X-ray to examine the shape of root canals and determine if there are any signs of infection in the surrounding bone.

procedureSteps.title: Local Anesthesia
procedureSteps.description: The area around the tooth is numbed using local anesthesia to ensure a completely pain-free experience during the procedure.

procedureSteps.title: Pulp Removal
procedureSteps.description: An access hole is drilled into the tooth. The diseased pulp, bacteria, and debris are removed using specialized instruments.

procedureSteps.title: Cleaning & Shaping
procedureSteps.description: The root canals are cleaned, enlarged, and shaped using tiny files. This creates space for the filling material.

procedureSteps.title: Filling & Sealing
procedureSteps.description: The cleaned canals are filled with a rubber-like material called gutta-percha and sealed with adhesive cement.

procedureSteps.title: Crown Placement
procedureSteps.description: A crown or cap is placed over the tooth to protect it and restore its full function. This may require a separate appointment.

faqs.question: Is root canal treatment painful?
faqs.answer: With modern anesthesia and techniques, root canal treatment is virtually painless. Most patients report the procedure is no more uncomfortable than getting a filling. You may experience some mild soreness for a few days after the procedure, which can be managed with over-the-counter pain medication.

faqs.question: How long does a root canal take?
faqs.answer: A typical root canal procedure takes 1-2 hours per visit. Simple cases may be completed in one visit, while complex cases (like molars with multiple canals) may require 2-3 visits.

faqs.question: How long does a root canal treated tooth last?
faqs.answer: With proper care and a good quality crown, a root canal treated tooth can last a lifetime. It's important to maintain good oral hygiene and visit your dentist regularly for check-ups.

faqs.question: What should I expect after the procedure?
faqs.answer: After the procedure, you may experience some sensitivity or mild discomfort for a few days. Avoid chewing on the treated tooth until it's fully restored with a crown. Take prescribed medications as directed and maintain good oral hygiene.

faqs.question: Is root canal better than extraction?
faqs.answer: In most cases, saving your natural tooth through root canal treatment is the better option. Natural teeth are stronger, more efficient for chewing, and help maintain your jawbone. Extraction often leads to additional costs for implants or bridges.

pricing.note: Final cost will be determined after examination. We offer flexible payment options.

teethWhitening.title: Teeth Whitening
teethWhitening.shortDescription: Get a brighter, whiter smile with professional teeth whitening

meta.title: Teeth Whitening in Hapur | Professional Dental Whitening
meta.description: Professional teeth whitening treatment for a brighter smile. Safe and effective whitening at Ujjwal Dental Clinic.

hero.heading: Teeth Whitening
hero.subheading: Achieve a brighter, more confident smile

overview.title: What is Professional Teeth Whitening?
overview.content: Professional teeth whitening is a cosmetic dental procedure that lightens teeth and removes stains and discoloration. It's one of the most popular cosmetic dental procedures because it can significantly improve how your teeth look.

sections.title: Causes of Tooth Discoloration
items: Coffee, tea, and red wine consumption
Tobacco use (smoking or chewing)
Poor dental hygiene
Aging - enamel wears down over time
Certain medications
Fluorosis (excess fluoride during tooth development)

faqs.question: Is teeth whitening safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, professional teeth whitening is safe when performed by a qualified dentist. We use approved whitening agents and take precautions to protect your gums and oral tissues.

faqs.question: How long do whitening results last?
faqs.answer: Results typically last 1-3 years depending on your diet and oral habits. Avoiding staining foods and drinks, and maintaining good oral hygiene helps prolong results.

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.shortDescription: Permanent tooth replacement with dental implants

meta.title: Dental Implants in Hapur | Permanent Tooth Replacement
meta.description: High-quality dental implants for permanent tooth replacement. Natural-looking results at Ujjwal Dental Clinic.

hero.heading: Dental Implants
hero.subheading: The gold standard for replacing missing teeth

overview.title: What are Dental Implants?
overview.content: Dental implants are titanium posts that are surgically placed into the jawbone to serve as artificial tooth roots. Once in place, they provide a stable foundation for replacement teeth that look, feel, and function like natural teeth.

body.title: Aftercare Instructions
items: Avoid eating until numbness wears off
Take prescribed medications
Avoid hard or crunchy foods for 24 hours
Maintain good oral hygiene
Contact us if you experience severe pain or swelling

body.question: Can I eat after root canal?
body.answer: Wait until the numbness wears off (usually 2-4 hours) before eating. Start with soft foods and avoid chewing on the treated side until the crown is placed.
